name: Angelcam, Inc.
description: Developer of an IP camera integration platform designed to make network cameras smarter for streaming live videos and audio. The company's IP camera integration platform offers a plug and play connection for various camera brands and a cloud-based application store for companies to build different applications for real-time audio and video analysis, enabling owners to connect multiple devices to the cloud, view the real-time footage on one place, from any device, anytime.
one_liner: Developer of an IP camera integration platform designed to make network cameras smarter for streaming live videos and audio. The company's IP camera integration platform offers a plug and play connection for various camera brands and a cloud-based application store for companies to build different applications for real-time audio and video analysis, enabling owners to connect multiple devices to the cloud, view the real-time footage on one place, from any device, anytime.
